## Message.isSelfMessageAuthor() method

Check if current user is the message author

**Signature:**

```typescript
isSelfMessageAuthor(strict?: boolean): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  strict | boolean | _(Optional)_ Allow returning true if required data is not pulled |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if current user is the message author
